text: Alexander Giannoulias ( ; born March 16, 1976) is an American financier and politician who has been the 38th Illinois Secretary of State since 2023. Giannoulias ran as the Democratic nominee for Secretary of State in 2022. He was the 72nd Illinois Treasurer from 2007 to 2011. He is a Democrat. He was a candidate in the 2010 elections for the United States Senate, but lost to Republican Mark Kirk. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Alexi Giannoulias
